text: Mike Rossi or Michael Rossi may refer to: * Mike Rossi (DJ) (born 1967), Philadelphia-area DJ accused of cheating in the Lehigh Valley marathon * Mike Rossi (freestyle skier) (born 1994), American freestyle skier * Michael Rossi (character), a fictional character in the novel Peyton Place * Francis Rossi, frontman of the band Status Quo who was known as Mike Rossi early in his career ==See also== *Michaël Rossi, a French racing driver
title: Mike Rossi
